thread.section_title: InfocusDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InfocusDirect | infocusdirect.com
thread.title: Tisha Harden Lovett
thread.title_full: InfocusDirect reviewed by Tisha Harden Lovett

author: Tisha Harden Lovett
title: Tisha Harden Lovett
text: I purchased a projector bulb and it is PERFECT! I previously bought 2 InFocus projector bulbs (name brand, in fact) online from Wal-Mart because they were cheaper. Neither bulb was bright enough to see the items on the screen. They were refurbished obviously because of scratches on the mount--not stated on the website. For your best bet, buy directly from InFocus. You get what you pay for. 6 stars!
